actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to authorize the appointment of hearing examiners of congressional committees.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, the appointment of hearing examiners by congressional committees. Stipulates that each hearing examiner of a committee so designated is authorized to conduct hearings of the committee, or any subcommittee thereof.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to authorize the appointment of hearing examiners of congressional committees.
